ProductInfo.Features:
Professional 4 Channel DVR with 2 x 1/3" SONY CCD WDR Cameras, 600 TV lines, 3.6mm lens, 48pcs IR LED, 131 ft IR Distance. Wide Dynamic Range. iPhone, Android, and VGA support, Real Time Video/Audio Recording, Playback and Network capability, Network Video Monitor System browsing, PTZ Control.
DVR Feature: Support Phones with iPhone, Android, Windows Mobile, and Symbian VGA support IE or NVMS software (Network Video Monitor System) browsing PELCO-P ,PELCO-D, Samsung, Panasonic Manual/schedule/Motion Detection Recording Modes Time & date search easy access Live monitoring through internet from anywhere Easy navigation
GW612WD: Professional Waterproof Outdoor Camera, 1/3" SONY CCD, 600 TV lines, 3.6mm lens, 48pcs IR LED, 131 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on).
1/3" SONY CCD camera 600 TV lines WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) OSD Menu Auto Gain Control Electronic Shutter Adjustment
ProductInfo.Name: Complete 4 Channel CCTV Real Time H.264 DVR (500G HD) Surveillance Security Camera System Package with (2) x 600 TVL 1/3" Sony CCD, 3.6mm Lens, 48pcs IR LED, 131 feet IR Distance Waterproof Outdoor Camera
